{{todo.content}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Todo } from 'src/app/models/ToDo'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todos', templateUrl: './todos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todos.component.css'] }) export class TodosComponent implements OnInit { todos:Todo[] = []; constructor () {} ngOnInit(): void { this.todos = [{ content: 'First Todo', completed: false }, { content: 'Second Todo', completed: true } ] } }
